name: Post-Apocalyptic World Demo
description:
This was created for a class, within one semester. It's less of a game, and more of a demo of a part of a game idea. The assets were all created by me, with the textures primarily being a mashup of photographs (primarily down-scaled).

The main objective of the "game" is to locate/collect 3 fuses, and place them in a fuse box to power up a tower.

Random things I know are broke about it:

     - Camera rotation is not locked (can look 360 degrees up/down)

     - "Cell Tower" object tends to jiggle

     - Movement speed increases slightly if going diagonally
